abstract: Garrett Heath wins 2016 Great Edinburgh Cross Country men's race, with Mo Farah finishing second.
lead_paragraph: Mo Farah, in his first race of 2016, finished second to Garrett Heath of the United States at the rainy Great Edinburgh Cross Country men’s race.
snippet: Mo Farah, in his first race of 2016, finished second to Garrett Heath of the United States at the rainy Great Edinburgh Cross Country men’s race.
